text: Baba Appo Aap Guru Nanak Public School is a higher-secondary co-education Independent school in the Patiala city of Punjab, India. The school was founded in 2012 and is affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education since 2013. == References == Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Patiala Category:Educational institutions established in 2012 Category:2012 establishments in India
title: Baba Appo Aap Guru Nanak Public School
